"春節 <br> ts'ung tsih <br>"	<br> New year Spring festival <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

正月半 <br> tsung yöh pen <br>	<br> Fifteen day of the year (first half month) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
元宵節 <br> nyön siau tsih <br>	<br> Fifteen day of the first month of the year (sweet dumpling day) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
新年新歲 <br> sing nyin sing söi <br>	<br> New year new start <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
百花生日 <br> páh hwó sáng nyih <br>	<br> A hundred flower birthday (twelfth day of the second month) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
端午節 <br> tön ng tsih <br>	<br> Poetry festival (glutinous rice cake day) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"七巧日 <br> ts'ih ky'au nyih <br>"	<br> Seventh day of the seventh month (Chinese valentines day) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
八月半 <br> pah yöh pen <br>	<br> Moon festival <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"中秋節 <br> tsúng ts'ieu tsih <br>"	<br> Moon festival <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
團圓節 <br> dön yön tsih <br>	<br> Moon festival <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
重陽節 <br> dsúng yáng tsih <br>	"<br> Nineth day of the nineth month (elder's day) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
臘八 <br> lah pah <br>	<br> Eighth day of the twelfth month (glutinous porridge) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
送灶 <br> súng tsau <br>	<br> twenty third day of the twelfth month (sending off the kitchen god day) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

一道 <br> ih dau <br>	<br> Together <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
軟個頭 <br> nyön kuh deu <br>	<br> The original <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
單隻頭 <br> tan tsáh deu <br>	<br> Individual or separate <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
單根頭 <br> tan kung deu <br>	<br> Individual or separate (for stick or string) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
一碰能 <br> ih báng nung <br>	<br> 1. One moment<div>2. One touch or encounter</div><div>3. Slight touch</div><div>4. In an instant of time</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"一落托 <br> ih loh t'oh <br>"	<br> 1. In one go<div>2. Only once</div><div>3. One instance</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
無其數 <br> vú gyi sú <br>	<br> Countless (many) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
幾等幾樣 <br> kyi tung kyi yáng <br>	<br> 1. All variety (all levels and all types)<div>2. Different levels and classes</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
代詞 <br> de dsz <br>	<br> Pronouns <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"人稱代詞 <br> nyung ts'ung de dsz <br>"	<br> Personal pronouns <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"吃人碗半由人使喚 <br> ky'uh zung w'en pen yeu zung sz hwen <br>"	<br> If you eat half a bowl of rice of another man, you thereby are placed under obligations <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"皇天不負苦人心 <br> wong t'in peh veu k'ú zung sing <br>"	<br> Great Heaven never forgets the desire of a person in misery <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
敗子迴頭金不換 <br> bá tsz we deu kyung peh wen <br>	<br> The repentence of a prodigal is more precious than gold <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"推車撞之壁 <br> t'e ts'ó dsong tsz pih <br>"	<br> To wheel the cart against the wall, equivalent to knock your head against a stone wall <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
捨近而求遠 <br> só gyung rh gyeu yön <br>	<br> To forgeit what is near and seek what is far. It implies the folly of giving up the bird in the hand for the bird in the bush <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
忘恩負義 <br> vong ung veu nyi <br>	<br> To forget benefits recieved <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"順風扯旗 <br> zung fúng ts'á gyi <br>"	<br> To float the flag in the wind. This implies to follow the crowd and applies to a person of weak character <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
人心皆同 <br> zung sing kyá dúng <br>	<br> Human nature is one <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"惡有惡報善有善報若使勿報時刻未到 <br> oh yeu oh pau zen yeu zen pau záh sz veh pau zz k'uh vi tau <br>"	<br> Evil has an evil recompense, virtue has a good recompense. If the recompense does not appear, it is because the time has not yet arrived <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"冤有頭債有主 <br> y'ön yeu deu tsá yeu tsû <br>"	<br> 1. Enmity has a source, just as debt has a creditor<div>2. One must find the person that caused you harm and wrong (the cause)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"騙人自騙自 <br> ky'i zung zz ky'i zz <br>"	<br> To chear others is to cheat oneself <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"樹高千丈葉落歸根 <br> zû kau ts'in dsáng yih loh kwe kung <br>"	"<br> 1. Although the tree may be ten thousand feet high, its leaves fall down to the roots<div>2. (No matter how far the tree grows the leaves fall to the roots)</div><div>3. One always returns to one's heritage</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
人面獸心 <br> zung min seu sing <br>	<br> He has the face of a man and the heart of an animal <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"看死捏鼻頭 <br> k'ön si nyah bih deu <br>"	<br> To catch hold of the nose of a man who is dying. Equivalent to the expression to hit a man when he is down <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"落水撳 <br> loh sz ky'ung <br>"	<br> To press a drowning man down in the water. To hit a man when he is down <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"近朱者赤近墨者黑 <br> gyung tsû tse ts'uh gyung muh tse h'uh <br>"	<br> Contact with red ink makes you red. Contact with black ink makes you black <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
損人利己真小人 <br> sung zung li kyi tsung siau zung <br>	<br> To injure another to benefit yourself, is the part of a mean fellow <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"欺衆不欺一 <br> ky'i tsúng peh ky'i ih <br>"	<br> In dealing harshly with all, you do not deal harshly with anyone in particular <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"狗看滿天星 <br> k'eu k'ön men t'in sing <br>"	<br> The dog looks at the sky full of stars. This describes a stupid person who does not understand what he sees. <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
半途而廢 <br> pen dú rh fi <br>	<br> To give up halfway <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"謀事在人成事在天 <br> meu zz dse zung dsung zz dse t'in <br>"	<br> Man contrives, God accomplishes. Equivalent to Man proposeth, God disposeth. <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
步步升高 <br> bú bú sung kau <br>	<br> May you rise step by step <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"壽比南山福如東海 <br> zeu pi nen san fóh zû túng h'e <br>"	<br> May your longevity be like the Southern Mountain and your happiness like the Eastern sea <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
琴瑟調和 <br> gyung seh diau hú <br>	<br> May the harp and guitar harmonize. Note this is a wedding wish, the harp and guitar signifying the bride and groom. <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
百年偕老 <br> páh nyin kyá lau <br>	<br> May you have happiness for a hundred years. A wedding wish <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
成雙到老 <br> dsung song tau lau <br>	<br> May the couple remain united until old age. A wedding wish <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"稱心如意 <br> ts'ung sing zû i <br>"	<br> May everything be according to your own wishes <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"壽年千歲 <br> zeu nyin ts'in söi <br>"	<br> May you have a long life of a thousand years <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
一路順風 <br> ih lú zung fúng <br>	<br> May you have favourable winds on your journey <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
恭喜發財 <br> kúng hyi fah dse <br>	<br> May wealth and happiness both be yours. This wish is often used at New Years <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
四季平安 <br> sz kyi bing ön <br>	<br> May you have peace through the four seasons <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"狗汚乾<font color=""#ff0000"">起</font>糖<font color=""#ff0000"">都</font>拉吃哉 <br> keu ú kön ky'i dong tú lá ky'uh tse <br>"	<br> 1. Lucky<div>2. Willing to settle for anything</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"小狗跌拉汚囥裏 <br> siau keu tih lá ú k'ong li <br>"	<br> 1. (Little dog feel into poo)<br>2. To be lucky<div>3. To eat and enjoy all one wants</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
間日迴 <br> kan nyih we <br>	<br> I will see you in a day or two <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"普天下 <br> p'ú t'in hau <br>"	<br> Universal <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"合天底下 <br> heh t'in ti hau <br>"	<br> Beneath the whole of heaven <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
無所不能 <br> vú sú peh nung <br>	<br> Omnipotent <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
無所不在 <br> vú sú peh dse <br>	<br> Omnipresent <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
無所不知 <br> vú sú peh tsz <br>	<br> Omniscient <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

一面旗 <br> ih min gyi <br>	<br> A flag <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"大欺小現世寶 <br> dú ky'i siau yin sz pau <br>"	<br> It is shameful for adults to take advantage of children <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"大塊頭無清頭 <br> dú kw'e deu m ts'ing deu <br>"	<br> Fat people are slow witted and stupid <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
上有老下有小 <br> zong yeu lau hau yeu siau <br>	<br> Elders and young children to look after <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
上啥山捉啥柴 <br> zong sá san tsoh sá zá <br>	<br> 1. (The firewood picked depends on mountain climbed)<div>2. One must be adaptable and flexible</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
上數頭下數踋 <br> zong sú deu hau sú kyau <br>	<br> 1. To calculate clearly<div>2. To scold someone whole (head to toe)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"千好獨怕一恘 <br> ts'in h'au dóh p'ó ih ky'eu <br>"	<br> Thousands of good deeds are undone by one bad deed <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
小貓三隻四隻 <br> siau mau san tsáh sz tsáh <br>	<br> Only a few people <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"天無絕人之路 <br> t'in vú dsih nyung tsz lú <br>"	<br> There will always be a way out (hope) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"天勿怕地勿怕 <br> t'in veh p'ó di veh p'ó <br>"	<br> To not fear or be scared of anything <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"五六七保密廠 <br> ng lóh ts'ih pau mih ts'áng <br>"	<br> Government agency and department responsible for public cleaning <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"比死人多口氣 <br> pi si nyung tú k'eu ky'i <br>"	<br> 1. (Almost dead)<div>2. Aloof, unresponsive, unfriendly</div><div>3. Incapable (only capable of breathing)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
日勿做夜摸索 <br> nyih veh tsú yá móh soh <br>	<br> To only do things or work at night <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
日枷風夜枷雨 <br> nyih ká fúng yá ká yü <br>	"<br> If there is a sun's corona then tomorrow willl be windy. If there there is a moon's corona then tomorrow will be rain <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
疫苗 <br> yóh miau <br>	<br> Vaccination <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"勿#勿要銅錢 <br> veh # veh y'au dúng din <br>"	<br> If no this then no money needed (or charged) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿怕兇獨怕窮 <br> veh p'ó hyúng dóh p'ó gyúng <br>"	<br> Extremely poor people can be extremely vicious <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿怕笨只怕混 <br> veh p'ó bung tsuh p'ó wung <br>"	<br> Stupid is okay but lazy and not thinking is not <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿要氣只要記 <br> veh y'au ky'i tsuh y'au kyi <br>"	<br> When wronged, one must not become angry but instead to take revenge <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿管三七卄一 <br> veh kwen san ts'ih nyan ih <br>"	<br> To disregard everything <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
風勿來樹勿動 <br> fúng veh le zû veh dúng <br>	<br> 1. If there is no wind, tree will not move<div>2. Everything has a reason or cause</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
風勿搖水勿動 <br> fúng veh yau sz veh dúng <br>	<br> 1. If there is no wind water will not move<div>2. Calm water</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
風掃地月點燈 <br> fúng sau di yöh tin tung <br>	<br> 1. (Wind blown and moon as light)<div>2. Destitute or dirt poor</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
風箱裏個老蟲 <br> fúng siáng li kuh lau dsúng <br>	<br> 1. (A mouse trapped in bellows)<div>2. To be stuck between a rock and hard place</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
烏勿三白勿四 <br> ú veh san báh veh sz <br>	<br> 1. Cannot tell if black or white (not distinct colour)<div>2. Dirty and unclean</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
烏頭風白頭雨 <br> ú deu fúng báh deu yü <br>	<br> If cloud is dark there will be wind. If cloud is white there will be rain <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"六月債還得快 <br> lóh yöh tsá wan tuh kw'á <br>"	"<br> 1. To pay a debt off quickly<div>2. To promptly return or respond to other's joke or insult</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"飲茶 <br> y'áng dsó <br>"	<br> Yumcha <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
未學爬先學走 <br> vi hoh bó sin hoh tseu <br>	<br> 1. (To learn to walk before crawling)<div>2. To proceed and do things not in natural order</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"東北風雨太公 <br> túng póh fúng yü t'á kúng <br>"	<br> Wind from northeast will bring rain <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
東北風雨祖宗 <br> túng póh fúng yü tsú tsúng <br>	<br> Wind from northeast will bring rain <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
東家長西家短 <br> túng ká dsáng si ká tön <br>	<br> To gossip <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"只中看勿中用 <br> tsuh tsúng k'ön veh tsúng yúng <br>"	<br> Pretty but not useful or practical (person or object) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"只要記勿要氣 <br> tsuh y'au kyi veh y'au ky'i <br>"	<br> 1. If there is no wind, tree will not move<div>2. Everything has a reason or cause</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
只養人勿養心 <br> tsuh yáng nyung veh yáng sing <br>	<br> One can only raise a child but cannot expect the child to have the same thoughts and values <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"呌花子吃死蟹 <br> kyau hwó tsz ky'uh si h'á <br>"	<br> 1. (Beggar eats dead crab)<div>2. To love eating something (all is delicious)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
生米燒成熟飯 <br> sáng mi sau dsung zóh van <br>	<br> 1. (Raw rice cooked)<div>2. Irreversible action (eg. compulsory marriage due to sex)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"頭高高眉翹翹 <br> deu kau kau mi ky'au ky'au <br>"	<br> Arrogant and confident <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"出頭椽子先爛 <br> ts'eh deu yön tsz sin lan <br>"	<br> 1. (Wood that sticks out rots first)<div>2. The one who stands out will be punished first</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
耳聞勿如目睹 <br> rh vung veh zû móh tú <br>	<br> Hearing is not as good as seeing for oneself <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"有天無沒日踋 <br> yeu t'in m meh nyih kyáh <br>"	<br> This wish or desire will never be fulfilled <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"死脫人釘脫門 <br> si t'eh nyung ting t'eh mung <br>"	<br> When a person dies, everything related to that person ends <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
過一日是一日 <br> kú ih nyih zz ih nyih <br>	<br> 1. To pass time or days mindlessly<div>2. To be old and counting the days to death</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
有一句是一句 <br> yeu ih kyü zz ih kyü <br>	<br> To only speak of truth <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
死馬當活馬醫 <br> si mó tong weh mó i <br>	<br> 1. (Trying to save a dead horse)<div>2. To take the most extreme and risky solution or method</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"死到角角裏去 <br> si tau koh koh li ky'i <br>"	<br> 1. (To go die in a corner)<div>2. Fuck off!</div><div>3. Hopeless situation</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃大炮有勁道 <br> ky'uh dá p'au yeu kyung dau <br>"	<br> To eat something powerful and gain energy <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃五支雪茄煙 <br> ky'uh ng tsz sih gá in <br>"	<br> 1. (To eat five cigars)<div>2. To be slapped in the face</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃對門謝隔壁 <br> ky'uh te mung ziá káh pih <br>"	<br> 1. (To gain a favour from one person but to thank another)<div>2. To thank the wrong person</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃素碰着月大 <br> ky'uh sú báng dsáh yöh dú <br>"	<br> 1. (To eat vegetarian during big month)<div>2. To encounter bad luck</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"肉麻勿出腔調 <br> nyóh mó veh ts'eh ky'áng diau <br>"	<br> Being overly flirty is unattractive <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
先小人後君子 <br> sin siau nyung heu kyün tsz <br>	<br> Stating rules strictly, clearly and fairly at the start but being more lenient&nbsp; at later times of need <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"自稱好爛稻草 <br> zz ts'ung h'au lan dau ts'au <br>"	<br> People who praise themselves are not worthy <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
合子家做啥乖 <br> keh tsz ká tsú sá kwá <br>	"<br> To share things is better saving money to buy one's own <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "

"講勿出所以然 <br> kong veh ts'eh sú i zen <br>"	<br> Cannot explain <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"兩全勿得其美 <br> liáng dsin veh tuh gyi m'e <br>"	<br> Unable to satisfy both sides <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"連扳頭也勿出 <br> lin pan deu há veh ts'eh <br>"	<br> 1. To not talk about secrets<div>2. To not make a mistake in talking</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
求人勿如求己 <br> gyeu nyung veh zû gyeu kyi <br>	<br> To be self sufficient is better than seeking help from others <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
<div>求來個雨勿大<br></div> <br> gyeu le kuh yü veh dú <br>	<br> <div>1. (Heavens wind is insufficient)</div>2. Favours that one asks for are never sufficient <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"聽見風就是雨 <br> t'ing kyin fúng zieu zz yü <br>"	<br> 1. (To hear wind and think rain)<div>2. To over react</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"身寬勿如心寬 <br> sung kw'en veh zû sing kw'en <br>"	<br> 1. Happiness is more important than health<div>2. Its better to not borrow money</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"坐得正立得穩 <br> zú tuh tsung lih tuh w'ung <br>"	<br> 1. (To sit up and stand straight)<div>2. To be a good and upright citizen (person)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

飯瓜生拉甏裏 <br> van kwó sáng lá báng li <br>	"<br> 1. (Pumpkin in a pot)<div>2. One must sacrafice something to gain something else (one cannot have one's cake and eat it)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "

當斷勿斷反受其亂 <br> tong dön veh dön fan zeu gyi lön <br>	<br> One must be determined and resolute to avoid disaster <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

### <br> sáng wi gyuh	<br> Sandwich <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"三月裏個芥菜-早生心 <br> san yöh li kuh ká ts'e - tsau sáng sing <br>"	<br> To have an intention for something for a long time <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"大舞臺對過-天曉得 <br> dá vú de te kú - t'in hyau tuh <br>"	<br> God or heaven knows <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"開銷再大也是毛毛雨 <br> k'e siau tse dú há zz mau mau yü <br>"	<br> Does not matter how much money one spends, it is insignificant or small amount <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
月亮裏提燈-有名無實 <br> yöh liáng li di tung - yeu ming vú zeh <br>	"<br> Pointless and to not live up to one's name <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"世事讓三分天空地闊 <br> sz zz nyáng fung t'in k'úng di kw'eh <br>"	<br> To be more forgiving and merciful will make one feel better <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"東搭黃浦西搭海-講張 <br> túng tah wong p'ú si tah h'e - kong tsáng <br>"	<br> 1. (East to sea and west to Whampoo)<div>2. To talk and cover many topics of conversation</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"叫花子吃死蟹-隻隻好 <br> kau hwó tsz ky'uh si h'á - tsáh tsáh h'au <br>"	<br> Everything tastes good <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"只賣陽春麪勿加澆頭 <br> tsuh má yáng ts'ung min veh ká kyau deu <br>"	<br> 1. (To only sell plain noodles)<div>2. To only speak of honest truth without any embellishment</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
四金剛掃地-大材小用 <br> sz kyung kong sau di - dá dse siau yúng <br>	<br> To use people of great talent for menial tasks (overqualified) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
弄堂裏拔毛竹-拔直 <br> lúng dong li báh mau tsóh - bah dsuh <br>	<br> Straight (as in place or road) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"壞踋擡轎-吃力勿討好 <br> wá kyáh de gyau - ky'uh lih veh t'au h'au <br>"	<br> To put in effort but not be appreciated <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"豆芽菜炒藕-勾勾搭搭 <br> deu ngá ts'e ts'au ngeu - keu keu tah tah <br>"	<br> 1. (Sprout and lotus root)<div>2. To be stuck together and intertwined</div><div>3. To be in an improper relationship</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"冷鑊子裏爆出熱栗子 <br> láng woh tsz li pau ts'eh nyih lih tsz <br>"	<br> 1. (Hot chestnut from cold wok)<div>2. Unexpected or impossible</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"冷鑊子裏爆出熱栗子 <br> láng hóh tsz li pau ts'eh nyih lih tsz <br>"	<br> 1. (Hot chestnut from cold wok)<div>2. Unexpected or impossible</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"冷鑊子爆勿出熱栗子 <br> láng woh tsz pau veh ts'eh nyih lih tsz <br>"	<br> 1. (Hot chestnut from cold wok)<div>2. Unexpected or impossible</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"冷鑊子爆勿出熱栗子 <br> láng hóh tsz pau veh ts'eh nyih lih tsz <br>"	<br> 1. (Hot chestnut from cold wok)<div>2. Unexpected or impossible</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"釘頭碰着鐵頭-硬碰硬 <br> ting deu báng dsáng t'ih deu - ngáng p'áng ngáng <br>"	<br> 1. (Two hard thing hit each other)<div>2. Two tough people meet (standoff)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
陌生人弔孝-死人得知 <br> máh sáng nyung tiau hyau - si nyung tuh tsz <br>	<br> 1. (Stranger mourning)<div>2. The dead person will know</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
駝子跌倒-兩頭勿着實 <br> dú tsz tih tau - liáng deu veh dsáh zeh <br>	<br> 1. (When the camel falls)<div>2. One cannot rely on either side</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"啞子吃黃蓮-說勿出苦 <br> au tsz ky'uh wong lin - söh veh ts'eh k'ú <br>"	<br> 1. (Mute eats bitter herb)<div>2. Unspeakable suffering (that one cannot talk about)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"骨頭輕得無沒四兩重 <br> kweh deu ky'ung tuh m meh sz liáng dsúng <br>"	<br> 1. (Light boned)<div>2. Silly, unrealiable, not serious</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"拜菩薩勿計較蒲團破 <br> pá bú sah veh kyi kyau bú dön p'ú <br>"	"<br> 1. (To pray to Buddha with broken mat)<div>2. Doing something wholeheartedly, small losses won't matter</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"真人面前勿好說假話 <br> tsung nyung min zin veh h'au söh ká wó <br>"	<br> One must speak honestly to a sincere person <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
黃牛角水牛角-角管角 <br> wong nyeu koh sz nyeu koh - koh kwen koh <br>	"<br> 1. (Cow and buffalo horns)<div>2. To mind one's own business</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
眼睛一霎老母雞變鴨 <br> ngan tsing ih sah lau mú kyi pin ah <br>	<br> 1. (In a blink of an eye, a chicken becomes a duck)<div>2. To change very quickly</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"眼睛一𥅴雄鴨變雌鴨 <br> ngan tsing ih kah yúng ah pin ts'z ah <br>"	<br> 1. (In a blink of the eye, male become female duck)<div>2. To change very quickly</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
船頭上跑馬-走投無路 <br> zen deu long bau mó - tseu deu vú lú <br>	<br> 1. (Horse on boat)<div>2. Nowhere to go</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"踋爐蓋當鏡子照-看穿 <br> kyáh lú ke tong kyung tsz tsau - k'ön ts'en <br>"	<br> 1. (Use foot stove as mirror)<div>2. Transparent and see through</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"棺材裏伸手-死要銅鈿 <br> kwen dse li sung seu - si y'au dúng din <br>"	<br> 1. (Hand from coffin)<div>2. To love money to death</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"就有就有初一到卄九 <br> zieu yeu zieu yeu ts'ú ih tau nyan kyeu <br>"	<br> To procastinate (and continue postponing) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"黑眼烏珠看見白銀子 <br> h'uh ngan ú tsû k'ön kyin báh nyung tsz <br>"	<br> 1. (To look at silver)<div>2. To see and want money</div><div>3. To be greedy</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
牌頭𬮿噱頭擺苗頭别 <br> bá deu ge hyöh deu pá miau deu bih <br>	"<br> To praise oneself, to speak of one's powerful supporters and enjoy comparing against others competitively <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
算盤珠拔一拔動一動 <br> sön ben tsû bah ih bah dúng ih dúng <br>	<br> 1. (To move the abacus)<div>2. A person who need to be pushed and pressured to do anything</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"錯得連屋裏也勿認得 <br> ts'ú tuh lin óh li há veh nyung tuh <br>"	<br> 1. To be so wrong that one forgets home<div>2. To be very wrong</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"滿飯吃得滿話講勿得 <br> men van ky'uh tuh men wó kong veh tuh <br>"	<br> 1. (Eat full bowl of rice)<div>2. One should not speak with complete certainty or definitively</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
額角頭碰着隔壁鄰舍 <br> ngah koh deu báng dsáh káh pih ling só <br>	"<br> 1. (Touch forehead to one's neighbour)<div>2. Badluck</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"瘌痢頭頭髮-稀稀忒少 <br> lah li deu deu fah - hyi hyi t'uh sau <br>"	<br> Patchy or sparse <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"一隻碗勿响兩隻碗叮噹 <br> ih tsáh w'en veh hyáng liáng tsáh w'en ting tong <br>"	<br> 1. (One bowl makes no sound)<div>2. A fight or any interaction requires two willing people or parties (it takes two to tango)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"一年兩頭春餓殺經紀人 <br> ih nyin liáng deu ts'ung ngú sah kyung kyi nyung <br>"	<br> Two springs in one year, makes a business man poor (spending at a festival) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"一家十五口七嘴八舌頭 <br> ih ká zeh ng k'eu ts'ih tsz pah zeh deu <br>"	<br> In a large family everyone has a different opinion <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"千算萬算勿如老天一算 <br> ts'in sön van sön veh zû lau t'in ih sön <br>"	<br> No matter how much hardwork one puts in, one cannot defy fate <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"人爭一口氣勿爭一股香 <br> nyung tsáng ih k'eu ky'i veh tsáng ih kú hyáng <br>"	<br> One should have ambition for success <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"人往高處走水往低處流 <br> nyung mong kau ts'û tseu sz mong ti ts'û lieu <br>"	<br> People have ambition and aim for success (only water flows down) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"三日勿開口神仙難下手 <br> san nyih veh k'e k'eu zung sin nan hau seu <br>"	<br> It is difficult to judge a quiet person and to action appropriately <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"三日勿吃青眼睛冒火星 <br> san nyih veh ky'uh ts'ing ngan tsing mau h'ú sing <br>"	<br> If one does not eat vegetables one will feel unhealthy and uncomfortable <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"大吵三六九小吵日日有 <br> dú ts'au san lóh kyeu siau ts'au nyih nyih yeu <br>"	<br> To be constantly arguing and fighting (all the time) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"大魚吃小魚小魚吃蝦米 <br> dú ng ky'uh siau ng siau ng ky'uh h'ön mi <br>"	<br> 1. (Big fish eat small fish)<div>2. Big players eat small players (dog eat dog)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"大餅配油條雞頭配踋爪 <br> dá ping p'e yeu diau kyi deu p'e kyáh tsau <br>"	<br> 1. (Pancake with youtiao and chicken head with feet)<div>2. Everything and everyone has a suitable match</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"丈母看女婿越看越有趣 <br> dsáng m k'ön nyü si yöh k'ön yöh yeu ts'ü <br>"	<br> 1. (Mother in law sees son in law)<div>2. When the mother in law favours or likes the son in law</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"小個吃拳頭大個吃饅頭 <br> siau kuh ky'uh gyön deu dú kuh ky'uh men deu <br>"	<br> To treat suboordinates unfairly and inconsistently <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"小囡吐饞唾一沰還一沰 <br> siau nön t'ú dsan t'ú ih toh wan ih toh <br>"	<br> To take revenge the same way one suffers <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"小踋老太婆吃飯敲銅鼓 <br> siau kyáh lau t'á bú ky'uh van k'au dúng kú <br>"	<br> Person is clumsy and noisy when eating <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"千㨂萬㨂㨂着痘子瞎眼 <br> ts'in ke van ke ke dsáh deu tsz h'ah ngan <br>"	<br> To be too picky, decisive and eventually be married to a blind loser and idiot (as a woman) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"千做萬做折本生意勿做 <br> ts'in tsú van tsú zeh pung sáng i veh tsú <br>"	<br> Willing to anything to make money except for loss making business <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
女人勿是人糯米勿是米 <br> nyü nyung veh zz nyung nú mi veh zz mi <br>	<br> Women are inferior <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"天下無難事獨怕老面皮 <br> t'in hau m nan zz dóh p'ó lau min bi <br>"	<br> Nothing is difficult except for dealing with shameless people <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"天無一值雨人無一世窮 <br> t'in vú ih dsuh yü nyung vú ih sz gyúng <br>"	<br> It will not always rain, one will not always be poor <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"牙齒脫舌頭也要打相打 <br> ngá ts'z t'öh zeh deu há y'au táng siáng táng <br>"	<br> Even the closest people will still fight, argue and have conflict <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"少吃有滋味多吃壞肚皮 <br> sau ky'uh yeu tsz mi tú ky'uh wá dú bi <br>"	<br> To eat alittle bit is delicious or tasty but to eat too much is uncomfortable <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
升到五層樓跌倒陽泥溝 <br> sung tau ng dsung leu tih tau yáng nyi keu <br>	<br> The higher one rises, the steeper and greater the fall <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"長吵三六九小吵日日有 <br> dsáng ts'au san lóh kyeu siau ts'au nyih nyih yeu <br>"	<br> To be constantly arguing and fighting (all the time) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"烏雲結得高明朝曬斷腰 <br> ú yün kyih tuh kau ming tsau só dön y'au <br>"	<br> If today is cloudy tomorrow will be sunny <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"烏雲結得高明朝曬斷腰 <br> ú yün kyih tuh kau mung tsau só dön y'au <br>"	<br> If today is cloudy tomorrow will be sunny <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿怕天火燒只怕跌一跤 <br> veh p'ó t'in h'ú sau tsuh p'ó tih ih kau <br>"	<br> Nothing is more dangerous than falling over (towards an old person usually) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
勿當家勿曉得柴米貴 <br> veh tong ká veh hyau tuh zá mi kyü <br>	<br> Only the head of household understands how expensive things are (and how hard life is) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿聽老人言吃苦拉眼前 <br> veh t'ing lau nyung yin ky'uh k'ú lá ngan zin <br>"	<br> Listen to elders otherwise suffer misfortune <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿怕雙踋跳就怕朝儂笑 <br> veh p'ó song kyáh t'iau zieu p'ó dsau núng siau <br>"	<br> One is not scared of your open aggressive actions but is scared of your passive aggression and obstruction <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿怕勿識貨就怕貨比貨 <br> veh p'ó veh suh h'ú zieu p'ó h'ú pi h'ú <br>"	<br> Only through comparison can determine if a product is good quality <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
勿像一家人勿進一家門 <br> veh ziáng ih ká nyung veh tsing ih ká mung <br>	"<br> The inlaws must assimilate and adapt into the family's customs <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"欠之小人債一日討到夜 <br> ky'in tsz siau nyung tsá ih nyih t'au tau yá <br>"	<br> If one owes a debt to child, one will be constantly hounded or harrassed <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"欠之小人債早晨討到夜 <br> ky'in tsz siau nyun tsá tsau zung t'au tau yá <br>"	<br> If one owes a debt to child, one will be constantly hounded or harrassed <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"丑戲鑼鼓多丑人閒話多 <br> ts'eu hyi lú kú tú ts'eu nyung han wó tú <br>"	<br> 1. (Poor performer relies on gongs and ugly person relies on words)<div>2. A person with poor character is often criticised by others</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"打我勿還手罵我勿還口 <br> táng ngú veh wan seu mó ngú veh wan k'eu <br>"	"<br> To tolerate other people's beating and scolding <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"世間無難事獨怕老面皮 <br> sz kyin vú nan zz dóh p'ó lau min bi <br>"	<br> There is nothing more difficult than dealing with shameless people <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
石臼裏向爲松根-兜底硬 <br> záh gyeu li hyáng we súng kung - teu ti ngáng <br>	<br> 1. (Tree root grows out of rock)<div>2. The origin, core, essence is tough and hard</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"東風兩頭大西風腰裏粗 <br> túng fúng liáng deu dú si fúng y'au li ts'ú <br>"	<br> In spring easterly wind blows in morning and night, westerly wind bows in the miday. Eastern wind brings rain while western wind brings dry air. <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"東耳朵管進西耳朵管出 <br> túng nyi tú kwen tsing si nyi tú kwen ts'eh <br>"	<br> 1. (In one ear and out the other)<div>2. To not remember</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"四金剛騰雲-懸空八隻踋 <br> sz kyung kong dung yün - yön k'úng pah tsáh kyáh <br>"	<br> 1. (Feet in the air)<div>2. Far away (as in a matter or issue)</div><div>3. Hanging high in the air and not touching the ground</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"白露雨迷迷秋分稻秀齊 <br> báh lú yü mi mi ts'ieu fung dau sieu dsi <br>"	<br> Rice grown during wet season is harvested in autumn <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"外行看熱鬧內行看門道 <br> ngá hong k'ön nyih nau ne hong k'ön mung dau <br>"	<br> Lay person only sees the outside and obvious, while experts watch for internal technicalities and mechanisms <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
冬來呌一聲鹽米貴如金 <br> túng le kyau ih sáng yin mi kyü zû kyung <br>	<br> Rolling thunder in winter means poor harvest with expensive rice and salt prices <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"出門看天色進門看面色 <br> ts'eh mung k'ön t'in suh tsing mung k'ön min suh <br>"	"<br> One must watch other's facial expression (as if watching weather during an outing) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"老鬼勿脫手脫手勿老鬼 <br> lau kyü veh t'öh seu t'öh seu veh lau kyü <br>"	<br> A shrew calculating person will not let go of anything <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
老蟛蜞打洞小蟛蜞受用 <br> lau báng gyi táng dúng siau báng gyi zeu yúng <br>	"<br> The descendants enjoy the gains and improvements made by one's elders <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"在家千日好出外一時難 <br> dse kyá ts'in nyih h'au ts'eh ngá ih zz nan <br>"	<br> Life is easy at home but difficult when one leaves home <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"在家靠父母出門靠朋友 <br> dse kyá k'au vú mú ts'eh mung k'au báng yeu <br>"	<br> To rely on parents at home but to rely on friends outside <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"有理無理出拉衆人嘴裏 <br> yeu li m li ts'eh lá tsúng nyung tsz li <br>"	<br> People will judge whether its right or wrong <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"有福勿會享坐等到天亮 <br> yeu fóh veh we hyáng zú tung tau t'in liáng <br>"	<br> Unable and not knowing how to enjoy one good fortune and luck <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
早晨薄薄雲晚來曬殺人 <br> tsau zung bóh bóh yün wan le só sah nyung <br>	<br> Little clouds in the early morning means it will be sunny later <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃人個嘴軟拿人個手短 <br> ky'uh nyung kuh tsz nyön ne nyung kuh seu tön <br>"	<br> If one takes benefits from another person, then one must work to repay the favour <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃人個嘴軟拿人個手短 <br> ky'uh nyung kuh tsz nyön nau nyung kuh seu tön <br>"	<br> If one takes benefits from another person, then one must work to repay the favour <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃力勿討好阿王炒年糕 <br> ky'ih lih veh t'au h'au ah wong ts'au nyin kau <br>"	<br> To do things and not be appreciated <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃個籼米飯發個糯米嗲 <br> ky'uh kuh sin mi van fah kuh nú mi tiá <br>"	<br> 1. (To eat long grain rice but act like sticky rice)<div>2. To live in poverty but to still be happy</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃之新米飯勿講陳年話 <br> ky'uh tsz sing mi van veh kong dsung nyin wó <br>"	<br> To start anew and afresh and no need to talk about the past <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃盡當光勿喊一聲冤枉 <br> ky'uh dsing tong kwong veh h'an ih sáng y'ön w'ong <br>"	<br> 1. (If one eats everything then one has no regrets)<div>2. One is determined to do something</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃飯打沖鋒做事打瞌𥅻 <br> ky'uh van táng ts'ung fúng tsú zz táng k'eh ts'úng <br>"	<br> 1. (To go first for food and sleep during work)<div>2. To be lazy</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃苦勿記苦老來無結果 <br> ky'uh k'ú veh kyi k'ú lau le m kyih kú <br>"	"<br> One should learn from one's mistake to avoid the same troubles <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"先下手爲強後下手遭殃 <br> sin hau seu we gyáng heu hau seu tsau y'áng <br>"	<br> One should strike first in any conflict <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
𪥸 <br> vau <br>	<br> Not good <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"好馬撥人騎好人有欺 <br> h'au mó peh nyung gyi h'au nyung yeu ky'i <br>"	<br> An honest man is taken advantage of (like an obedient horse that is ridden) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"好事勿出門惡事傳千里 <br> h'au zz veh ts'eh mung oh zz dsen ts'in li <br>"	<br> Bad news spreads much faster than good news <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"賣屋要看梁娶媳要看孃 <br> má óh y'au k'ön liáng ts'ü sih y'au k'ön nyáng <br>"	<br> When finding a wife one must assess her mother (like how one asseses the rafters before purchasing or buying a house) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"花有香色味人有才情趣 <br> hwó yeu hyáng suh mi nyung yeu dse dsing ts'ü <br>"	<br> People have talents, abilities, emotions and interests (like the fragrance, colour and taste) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"秀才碰着兵有理講勿清 <br> sieu dse báng dsáh ping yeu li kong veh ts'ing <br>"	<br> Scholars cannot explain reason to soldiers (who always resort to violence) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
斷水斷糧消滅老蟲 <br> dön sz dön liáng siau mih lau dsúng <br>	<br> 1. (No food and water kills the rats)<div>2. No food and water</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"身安茅屋穩性定菜根香 <br> sung ön mau óh w'ung sing ding ts'e kung hyáng <br>"	<br> Even in poverty one can have a happy life as long as one is calm and content <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
牀底下放鷂子-大高勿妙 <br> zong ti hau fong yau tsz - dá kau veh miau <br>	<br> 1. An impending bad or unfortunate event<div>2. Sparrow under the bed</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"牀上是夫妻牀下是君子 <br> zong long zz fú ts'i zong hau zz kyün tsz <br>"	<br> To be polite and gentleman like normally but affectionate in bed (a freak in the sheets and a gentleman on the streets) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"閒言未必真聽話聽三分 <br> han yin vi pih tsung t'ing wó t'ing san fung <br>"	<br> One should not believe in gossip (only thirty percent is true) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
閒時勿燒香急來抱佛踋 <br> han zz veh sau hyáng kyih le bau veh kyáh <br>	<br> 1. To not prepare nor build up favours during good times but become desperate during bad times<div>2. Normally lazy but looks for solutions when in critical situation</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"冷來要被絮老來要大細 <br> láng le y'au bi si lau le y'au dú si <br>"	<br> One relies on children when old (like blankets when cold) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"若要人勿知除非己莫爲 <br> záh y'au nyung veh tsz dsû fi kyi móh we <br>"	<br> One day all secrets will be exposed by other and not be hidden <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"若要小囡健常帶三分飢 <br> záh y'au siau nön gyin dsáng tá san fung kyi <br>"	<br> If one wants a healthy child, one should not allow the child to eat too much <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"若要天花粉菜起杜瓜根 <br> záh y'au t'in hwó fung ts'e ky'i dú kwó kung <br>"	<br> If one wants a particular result one must do things from the beginning (like ground the powder) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"枉佔三尺良田無人來理 <br> w'ong tsen san ts'áh liáng din m nyung le li <br>"	<br> 1. When a lazy person has land but does not farm it<div>2. Lazy person with assets and does not use it</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"雨落釘鞋傘天好酒肉飯 <br> yü loh ting há san t'in h'au tsieu nyóh van <br>"	<br> 1. (Gumboots and umbrella during rain, and wine, food, meat during a good day)<div>2. Life is very good</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"儂有千條計我有好主意 <br> núng yeu ts'in diau kyi ngú yeu h'au tsû i <br>"	<br> 1. (You have a thousand strategies, I have one good idea)<div>2. We are both smart</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"儂有關門計我有跳牆法 <br> núng yeu kwan mung kyi ngú yeu t'iau ziáng fah <br>"	<br> 1. (You close the door, I will jump the wall)<div>2. You cannot stop me, I have a solution</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"金窠銀窠勿如自家狗窠 <br> kyung k'ú nyung k'ú veh zû zz ká keu k'ú <br>"	"<br> No matter how grand other's houses are, my home is the best <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"斧頭吃鑿頭鑿頭吃木頭 <br> fú deu ky'uh zoh deu zoh deu ky'uh móh deu <br>"	<br> 1. (Axe breaks the chisel which breaks the wood)<div>2. Every superior level oppresses the lower levels</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
寶貝肉心肝夜夜焐尿乾 <br> pau pe nyóh sing kön yá yá ú sz kön <br>	<br> To claim to be affectionate but not willing to perform caring duties (eg. refusing to change nappies) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"空有一身牛力無地可耕 <br> k'úng yeu ih sung nyeu lih vú di k'au kung <br>"	<br> 1. (To have strength but nowhere to use) to have talent but nowhere to apply<div>2. A single man (no relationship)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"要吃天花粉鏟起杜瓜根 <br> y'au ky'uh t'in hwó fung ts'an ky'i dú kwó kung <br>"	<br> If one wants a particular result one must do things from the beginning (like ground the powder) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"要知心裏事但聽口中言 <br> y'au tsz sing li zz dan t'ing k'eu tsúng yin <br>"	<br> To know what one thinks, listen to what one says <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"面孔笑嘻嘻勿是好東西 <br> min k'úng siau hyi hyi veh zz h'au túng si <br>"	<br> A smiling person who is calculating, shrewd and evil <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"面上笑呵呵肚裏毒蛇窠 <br> min long siau h'ú h'ú dú li dóh zó k'ú <br>"	<br> A smiling person who is calculating, shrewd and evil <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"恘戲鑼鼓多窮人閒話多 <br> ky'eu hyi lú kú tú gyúng nyung han wó tú <br>"	<br> 1. (Poor performer relies on gongs but a poor person relies on words)<div>2. Poor people like to talk and speak</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
養子孫只養身來勿養心 <br> yáng tsz sung tsuh yáng sung le veh yáng sing <br>	<br> One can only raise descendents or children but cannot control their minds <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"前客讓後客烏龜讓嫖客 <br> zin k'áh nyáng heu k'áh ú kyü nyáng biau k'áh <br>"	<br> <div>1. (Giving way to late people and husband offering wife to brothel patrons)</div>2. Even if something is a trend that does not make it appropriate <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"鐵尺磨綉針只要功夫深 <br> t'ih ts'áh mú sieu tsung tsuh y'au kúng fú sung <br>"	<br> 1. (Turn metal ruler into a needle only requires effort)<div>2. Anything is possible with hardwork</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"造房子看梁討新婦看孃 <br> zau vong tsz k'ön liáng t'au sing vú k'ön nyáng <br>"	<br> When finding a wife one must assess her mother (like how one assesses the rafters before building a house) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"腦子勿轉彎一根筋到底 <br> nau tsz veh tsen w'an ih kung kyung tau ti <br>"	<br> Inflexible, rigid and stubborn <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"借傘勿用謝只要㫰過夜 <br> tsiá san veh yúng ziá tsuh y'au long kú yá <br>"	<br> When borrowing an umbrella one does not need to say thanks, only need to dry it <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
瓶子扎得住人嘴扎勿住 <br> bing tsz tsah tuh dsû nyung tsz tsah veh dsû <br>	<br> One cannot stop others from talking, gossiping (unlike a bottle that can be closed) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"拳頭朝外打臂把朝裏彎 <br> gyön deu dsau ngá táng pi pó dsau li w'an <br>"	"<br> One should use fists to fight outsiders and cover or protect one's own <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
燒香望和尚一事兩勾當 <br> sau hyáng mong hú zong ih zz liáng keu tong <br>	<br> 1. To achieve two aims at once<div>2. (Kill two birds with one stone)</div><div>3. (To see the monk and light incense)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
孃家個飯香婆家個飯長 <br> nyáng ká kuh van hyáng bú ká kuh van dsáng <br>	"<br> 1. (As a woman, mother's rice is fragrant but mother in laws rice is longer)<div>2. One may enjoy or miss life with one's parents but will have to live with mother in law forever</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"甜勿過蜂蜜親過勿爺孃 <br> din veh kú fúng mih ts'ing kú veh yá nyáng <br>"	<br> Parents are good and best (just like sweet honey) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"偷個水甜個偷個餅酸個 <br> t'eu kuh sz din kuh t'eu kuh ping sön kuh <br>"	<br> 1. (Stolen cookies and water taste good)<div>2. Other things are the best (the grass is greener on the other side)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"袋得肚皮寬哭得眼睛酸 <br> de tuh dú bi kw'en k'óh tuh ngan tsing sön <br>"	<br> To cry and be sad over multiple miscarrages <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
船頭上相罵船肚裏白話 <br> zen deu long siáng mó zen dú li báh wó <br>	<br> It is normal for husband and wife to argue but also make up quickly <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>

"麻油拌青菜各人心裏愛 <br> mó yeu ben ts'ing ts'e koh nyung sing li e <br>"	<br> 1. (Sesame oil in vegetables, everyone likes)<div>2. Everyone has their own preferences (general)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"落雪狗歡喜麻雀一肚氣 <br> loh sih keu hwen hyi mó ts'iáh ih dú ky'i <br>"	<br> 1. (Dog likes snow but sparrow does not)<div>2. Same thing can please some but is disliked by others</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"棒頭出孝子筷頭出逆子 <br> bong deu ts'eh hyau tsz kw'an deu ts'eh nyuh tsz <br>"	<br> 1. (The rod raises filial children whilst food raises disobedient children)<div>2. Spare the rod, spoil the kid</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"蛐蟮唱山歌有雨落勿大 <br> ky'óh zen ts'ong san kú yeu yü loh veh dú <br>"	<br> It will not rain heavy when earthworms make popping noise <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"寒天吃冷水點點對心頭 <br> hön t'in ky'uh láng sz tin tin te sing deu <br>"	<br> 1. (To drink cold water in winter)<div>2. To endure and never forget</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"新開豆腐店賣賣老價鈿 <br> sing k'e deu vú tin má má lau ká din <br>"	<br> 1. (New tofu shop with old old price)<div>2. Any new ship that sells things expensively</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"滿口飯好吃滿口話難講 <br> men k'eu van h'au ky'uh men k'eu wó nan kong <br>"	<br> One should not speak or say things with certainty <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"癡子望天坍窮人望民反 <br> ts'z tsz mong t'in t'an gyúng nyung mong ming fan <br>"	<br> To dream of big changes (such as the heavens falling and revolution) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"牆裏有人話牆外有人聽 <br> ziáng li yeu nyung wó ziáng ngá yeu nyung t'ing <br>"	<br> One should not gossip about other people because they can hear and will find out <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"慢人有慢福晚來吃厚粥 <br> man nyung yeu man fóh an le ky'uh heu tsóh <br>"	<br> Slow and late people can have their own good luck <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"耳朵燙 <br> nyi tú t'ong <br>"	<br> 1. (Ears on fire)<div>2. When someone is talking or gossiping about you</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"靠人儕是假跌倒自家爬 <br> k'au nyung dse zz ká tih tau zz ká bó <br>"	<br> Do not rely on others, if one falls get up yourself <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
籬笆扎得緊野狗鑽勿進 <br> li pó tsah tuh kyung yá keu tsön veh tsing <br>	<br> 1. (Strong fence protects against wild dogs)<div>2. A strong defence protects against attack</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"蟑螂搭灶雞一對好夫妻 <br> tsong long tah tsau kyi ih te h'au fú ts'i <br>"	<br> 1. (Cockroach and chicken, husband and wife)<div>2. Partners in crime</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"人勿可貌相海水勿可斗量 <br> nyung veh k'au mau siáng h'e sz veh k'au teu liáng <br>"	<br> One cannot judge a person by their appearance (like how cannot measure the ocean) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"人勿可貌相海水勿可斗量 <br> nyung veh k'ú mau siáng h'e sz veh k'ú teu liáng <br>"	<br> One cannot judge a person by their appearance (like how cannot measure the ocean) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"大閘蟹走淮海路-橫行霸道 <br> dú zah h'á tseu wá h'e lú - wáng yung pó dau <br>"	<br> 1. (Hairy crab walking on Huahai road)<div>2. To walk sidewards</div><div>3. Overbearing and does whatever one wants</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"千算萬算勿如老天爺一算 <br> ts'in sön van sön veh zû lau t'in yá ih sön <br>"	"<br> One cannot fight fate regardless of one's calculations <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"風箱裏個老蟲-幾頭勿討好 <br> fúng siáng li kuh lau dsúng - kyi deu veh t'au h'au <br>"	<br> No good outcome and all bad (like a mouse the bellows) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
黃毛 <br> wong mau <br>	<br> (Derogatory) white person <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"白孃孃得法海鬥法-精打光 <br> báh nyáng nyáng tuh fah h'e teu fah - tsing táng kwong <br>"	<br> 1. (Both the serpent and monk die)<div><div>2. To fight each other and both die (general)</div></div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
呆人有呆福泥菩薩住大惡 <br> nge nyung yeu nge fóh nyi bú sah dsû dú óh <br>	<br> Stupid people can have good luck (like a clay buddha in a large temple) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃飯飯榔頭做生活嫩骨頭 <br> ky'uh van van long deu tsú sáng weh nung kweh deu <br>"	<br> Lazy (only eats and does not work) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
踋踏西瓜皮滑倒那裏是那裏 <br> kyáh dah si kwó bi wah tau há li zz há li <br>	<br> 1. (To slip and slide on watermelon peel)<div>2. To live freely and to have no fixed plan</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"精彩來精彩起儕是戇來死 <br> tsing ts'e le tsing ts'e ky'i dse zz gong le si <br>"	<br> Anything that is overhyped but bad quality (product or general) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"增客勿殺雞筷頭上撥撥戲 <br> dsung k'áh veh sah kyi kw'an deu long peh peh hyi <br>"	<br> 1. (To only add cutlery and not chicken)<div>2. To not be hospitable to a guest</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"玻璃絲調鹹蛋一談也勿要談 <br> pú li sz diau han dan ih dan há veh y'au dan <br>"	<br> Pointless to talk about <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"上氣勿接下氣當中橫裏斷氣 <br> zong ky'i veh tsih hau ky'i tong tsúng wáng li dön ky'i <br>"	<br> Huffing and puffing <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"千日天好勿見一日雨落就厭 <br> ts'in nyih t'in h'au veh kyin ih nyih yü loh zieu y'in <br>"	<br> To not appreciate when things are stable and good but to suddenly hate it when things change <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"山東人吃麥冬吃得一懂勿懂 <br> san túng nyung ky'uh máh túng ky'uh tuh ih túng veh túng <br>"	"<br> Stupid Shandong person (who doesn't know what they are eating) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
小姐養倒一百歲也是人家人 <br> siau tsiá yáng tau ih páh söi há zz nyung ká nyung <br>	"<br> One's daughter, no matter how old, will always be part of someone's family <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"飛機上弔大閘蟹-懸空八隻踋 <br> fi kyi long tiau dú zah h'á - yön k'úng pah tsáh kyáh <br>"	<br> 1. (Crab hang off a plane)<div>2. Hanging high or suspended in the air</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"天要落雨孃要嫁人爺要討親 <br> t'in y'au loh yü nyáng y'au ká nyung yá y'au t'au ts'ing <br>"	<br> 1. It is natural that things will change and happen<br>2. (It will rain and parents will remarry) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿怕身隔千里就怕心差毫釐 <br> veh p'ó sung káh ts'in li zieu p'ó sing ts'ó hau li <br>"	<br> To not be scared of physical distance but be worried about emotional distance <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"只有大意吃虧無沒小心上當 <br> tsuh yeu dá i ky'uh kw'e m meh siau sing zong tong <br>"	<br> If one is careful and rigourous, one will not be scammed <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃盡滋味鹽好走盡天邊孃好 <br> ky'uh dsing tsz mi yin h'au tseu dsing t'in pin nyáng h'au <br>"	"<br> One's mother is the best and kindest (like how salt is the most important flavour) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
儂問我我問啥人 <br> núng mung ngú ngú mung sá nyung <br>	<br> 1. (You ask me, who do I ask?)<div>2. I dont know</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃飯勿識飢飽睏覺勿知丁倒 <br> ky'uh van veh suh kyi pau kw'ung kau veh tsz ting tau <br>"	<br> To be confused (cannot tell whether one is hungry or full, and not knowing whether sleeping or awake) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"後生苦風吹過老來苦真個苦 <br> heu sáng k'ú fúng ts'z kú lau le k'ú tsung kuh k'ú <br>"	<br> Suffering at old age is worse than suffering at young age <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"男想女要一年女想男一歇歇 <br> nen siáng nyü y'au ih nyin nyü siáng nen ih hyih hyih <br>"	<br> Women get over heart break quickly but men take alot longer <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
男想女隔座山女想男隔層紙 <br> nen siáng nyü káh zú san nyü siáng nen káh dsung tsz <br>	<br> It is much harder for men to pick up than women (for a relationship) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"閒話越講越多坑缸越淘越臭 <br> han wó yöh kong yöh tú k'áng kong yöh dau yöh ts'eu <br>"	<br> To talk too much is annoying (like poo) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"紅黃藍白黑橘子檸檬咖啡色 <br> húng wong lan báh h'uh kyöh tsz nyung múng k'á fi suh <br>"	<br> 1. There are many colours<div>2. Naturally occurring colours in nature</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"別家金窠銀窠勿如自家狗窠 <br> bih ká kyung k'ú nyung k'ú veh zû zz ká keu k'ú <br>"	<br> One home is the best, no matter how humble compared to others <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"希奇勿煞爛泥菩薩一踋踢煞 <br> hyi gyi veh sah lan nyi bú sah ih kyáh t'ih sah <br>"	<br> (Scoffing) a showoff <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"含拉嘴裏怕烊兆拉手裏怕冷 <br> hen lá tsz li p'ó yáng dsau lá seu li p'ó láng <br>"	<br> (To overly take precautions and protections) and hence spoil the child <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"窮人只圖眼前富人要算來年 <br> gyúng nyung tsuh dú ngan zin fú nyung y'au sön le nyin <br>"	<br> To break the proverty cycle, one must plan and save for the future <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
冷末冷拉風裏窮末窮拉債裏 <br> láng meh láng lá fúng li gyúng meh gyúng lá tsá li <br>	<br> Debt makes one poor (like how wind makes one cold) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"冷粥冷飯好吃冷言冷語難擋 <br> láng tsóh láng van h'au ky'uh láng yin láng nyü nan tong <br>"	<br> To rather eat cold meal due to poverty than to endure passive aggression and verbal insults <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"撥出物事撥出嫁討迴自家買 <br> peh ts'eh meh zz peh ts'eh ká t'au we zz ká má <br>"	<br> Gifts are permanent and cannot be asked to be returned (like a daughter being married off) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"金鈴塔銀鈴塔三月龍華看寶塔 <br> kyung ling t'ah nyung ling t'ah san yöh lúng hwó k'ön pau t'ah <br>"	<br> The third month of the year is the best time to visit Lunghwa pagoda <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"種田要種沙地做人要做女婿 <br> tsúng din y'au tsúng só di tsú nyung y'au tsú nyü si <br>"	<br> To be a son in law is best ~ priviledged (like how sandy soil is best for farming) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"銅鈿銀子生勿帶來死勿帶去 <br> dúng din nyung tsz sung veh tá le si veh tá ky'i <br>"	<br> Do not value money too much because one cannot take money to the afterlife <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"做事要順人心講話要憑良心 <br> tsú zz y'au zung nyung sing kong wó y'au bing liáng sing <br>"	<br> One must speak conscientiously, morally, ethically and one should consider the opinion of others <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"偷個水是甜個偷個餅是酸個 <br> t'eu kuh sz zz din kuh t'eu kuh ping zz sön kuh <br>"	"<br> 1. (Stolen cookie and water tastes the most delicious)<div>2. Other people's things are the best</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"筷頭上出忤逆棒頭上出孝子 <br> kw'an deu long ts'eh ng nyuh bong deu long ts'eh hyau tsz <br>"	<br> 1. To not beat but feed the child will spoil him<div>2. (Spare the rod and spoil the child)</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"嫁得好哈哈笑嫁勿好雙踋跳 <br> ká tuh h'au h'á h'á siau ká veh h'au song kyáh t'iau <br>"	<br> Marriage is very important to a woman <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"鞋子著拉踋上褲子套拉頭上 <br> há tsz tsáh lá kyáh long k'ú tsz t'au lá deu long <br>"	<br> 1. (Shoes on feet and pants on head)<div>2. To dress inappropriately and in a hurry</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"懶人自有懶福晏來吃碗厚粥 <br> lan nyung zz yeu lan fóh an le ky'uh w'en heu tsóh <br>"	<br> Lazy people have their own good luck <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"嘴薄兩層皮翻來翻去儕是理 <br> tsz bóh liáng dsung bi fan le fan ky'i dse zz li <br>"	<br> (Someone) who is good at talking and spinning and has unlimited reasons <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"一隻嘴兩爿皮話好話壞儕是伊 <br> ih tsáh tsz liáng ban bi wó h'au wó wá dse sz yi <br>"	<br> (Someone) who is good at talking and spinning and has unlimited reasons <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"人是鐵飯是鋼一頓勿吃餓得慌 <br> nyung zz t'ih van zz kong ih tung veh ky'uh ngú tuh hwong <br>"	<br> If one does not eat, one cannot work due to lack of energy <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"丈母娘看女婿銅勺鏟刀像做戲 <br> dsáng m nyáng k'ön nyü si dúng dsoh ts'an tau ziáng tsú hyi <br>"	"<br> (As a man) one is always liked by one's mother in law <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"勿貪金勿貪銀只貪丈夫俏玲玲 <br> veh t'en kyung veh t'en nyung tsuh t'en dsáng fú ts'iau ling ling <br>"	<br> (As a woman) who only wants a good looking husband (not rich or wealthy) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"吃勿窮著勿窮算計勿通一世窮 <br> ky'uh veh gyúng tsáh veh gyúng sön kyi veh t'úng ih sz gyúng <br>"	<br> If one has a plan then one will not be poor, however if one spends everything then one will <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"男有心女有心銅牆鐵壁鑽得進 <br> nen yeu sing nyü yeu sing dúng ziáng t'ih pih tsön tuh tsing <br>"	<br> If a man and woman love each other nothing will stop them <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"一寸光陰一寸金寸金難買寸光陰 <br> ih ts'ung kwong y'ung ih ts'ung kyung ts'ung kyung nan má ts'ung kwong y'ung <br>"	<br> Time is money, but money cannot buy time <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
十八姑娘一朵花三十姑娘豆腐渣 <br> zeh pah kú nyáng ih tú hwó san seh kú nyáng deu vú tsó <br>	<br> A girl at eighteen is beautiful like a flower but a woman at thirty is like an old bean curd <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"又要馬兒走得好又要馬兒勿吃草 <br> yeu y'au mó rh tseu tuh h'au yeu y'au mó rh veh ky'uh ts'au <br>"	"<br> 1. (One wants horse to travel far but to not eat grass)<div>2. To have one's cake and eat it too</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"三日勿吃鹹菜湯踋裏有點酸汪汪 <br> san nyih veh ky'uh han ts'e t'ong kyáh li yeu tin sön w'ong w'ong <br>"	<br> 1. (Pickled vegetable soup)<div>2. Delicious or yummy (only used for pickled soup)</div><div>3. To be a close knit commuity in one village</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
三兩黃金買勿到四兩茶葉亭終身 <br> san liáng wong kyung má veh tau sz liáng dsó yih ding tsúng sung <br>	<br> Love is pure and cannot be bought with money, and only requires small genuine gestures <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"小囡口裏討賣信女人面前看功夫 <br> siau nön k'eu li t'au má sing nyü nyung min zin k'ön kúng fú <br>"	<br> Children are always honest but women are complicated or difficult <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"飛來燕子獨踋伙本地麻雀幫手多 <br> fi le in tsz dóh kyáh h'ú pung di mó ts'iáh pong seu tú <br>"	<br> Outlanders are always by themselves but locals are together and help each other <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"天作孽來猶可活自作孽來勿可活 <br> t'in tsoh nyih le yeu k'au weh zz tsoh nyih le veh k'au weh <br>"	<br> One can survive natural disasters but cannot survive disasters or troubles caused by oneself <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"天作孽來猶可活自作孽來勿可活 <br> t'in tsoh nyih le yeu k'ú weh zz tsoh nyih le veh k'ú weh <br>"	<br> One can survive natural disasters but cannot survive disasters or troubles caused by oneself <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
<div><div><div>射精</div></div></div> <br> zó tsing <br>	<br> To ejaculate, to cum <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"精液 <br> tsing y'uh <br>"	<br> Cum, ejaculate (the substance) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"日裏勿做虧心事半夜敲門心勿驚 <br> nyih li veh tsú kw'e sing zz pen yá k'au mung sing veh kyung <br>"	<br> If one does not wrong other people then one will not be scared by door knocking at night <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"牛吃稻柴鴨吃谷各人自有各人福 <br> nyeu ky'uh dau zá ah ky'uh kóh koh nyung zz yeu koh nyung fóh <br>"	<br> 1. (Animals have different food and people have different luck)<div>2. Everything is up to fate</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"牛吃稻柴鴨吃谷爛泥菩薩住瓦屋 <br> nyeu ky'uh dau zá ah ky'uh kóh lan nyi bú sah dsû ngau óh <br>"	<br> 1. (Animals have different food and Buddha lives under tiles)<div>2. Everything is up to fate</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
毛頭姑娘十八變臨到上轎變三變 <br> mau deu kú nyáng zeh pah pin ling tau zong gyau pin san pin <br>	<br> Girls keep getting prettier, good looking and attractive especially before marriage <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿開善門勿修福菩薩也愛香搭燭 <br> veh k'e zen mung veh sieu fóh bú sah há e hyáng táh tsóh <br>"	<br> 1. (Even Buddha cannot resist offerings and incense)<div>2. To not be able to resist taking bribes</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"勿有新婦要新婦有之新婦罵新婦 <br> veh yeu sing vú y'au sing vú yeu tsz sing vú mó sing vú <br>"	<br> To be difficult and treat the daughter in law poorly <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"半夜睏拉姐身邊半夜睏拉債身邊 <br> pen yá kw'ung lá tsiá sung pin pen yá kw'ung lá tsá sung pin <br>"	<br> To borrow money to buy a wife (which is your debt) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"有情那怕隔千里無情那怕門對門 <br> yeu dsing ná p'ó káh ts'in li vú dsing ná p'ó mung te mung <br>"	<br> Nothing can stop love (despite long distances) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"有緣千里來想會無緣對面勿相逢 <br> yeu yön ts'in li le siáng we vú yön te min veh siáng vúng <br>"	<br> Encounters between people are fated <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"年紀活之七八十風雲氣色看勿出 <br> nyin kyi weh tsz ts'ih pah zeh fúng yün ky'i suh k'ön veh ts'eh <br>"	"<br> Unable to tell people's emotions and facial expressions (even when old and experienced) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"多管閒事多拆屁少管閒事掃垃圾 <br> tú kwen han zz tú ts'áh p'i sau kwen han zz sau lá si <br>"	<br> Do not be nosy and mind your own business <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"宅上出之賢嫂嫂個個姑娘儕學好 <br> dsáh long ts'eh tsz yin sau sau kú kú kú nyáng dse hoh h'au <br>"	<br> If there is a female role model or lady in the family then every girl will learn from her <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"兩隻眼睛骨溜溜轉勿出啥好念頭 <br> liáng tsáh ngan tsing kweh lieu lieu tsen veh ts'eh sá h'au nyan deu <br>"	<br> 1. (To have busy eyes)<div>2. Shrewd, cunning and calculating</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"兩相情願脫褲子一想情願吃官司 <br> liáng siáng dsing nyön t'öh k'ú tsz ih siáng dsing nyön ky'uh kwen sz <br>"	<br> If both parties are willing then it is sex but if only one party (person) is willing then it is illegal and rape <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"快快活活活之命氣氣悶悶成之病 <br> kw'á kw'á weh weh weh tsz ming ky'i ky'i m'ung m'ung dsung tsz bing <br>"	<br> If one is happy, one will live a long life, but if one is sad, then one will become sick <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"看人挑擔勿吃力自上肩胛嘴要歪 <br> k'ön nyung t'au tan veh ky'ih lih zz zong kyin kah tsz y'au hwá <br>"	<br> To watch other people do things is easy but it is hard to do oneself <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"根深勿怕風搖動樹正何愁日影斜 <br> kung sung veh p'ó fúng yau dúng zû tsung hú dseu nyih y'ung ziá <br>"	<br> 1. (If tree roots are deep it will not shake or be moved by wind, if tree is straight then it will have no crooked shadow)<div>2. A moral, dignified person is not afraid of slander or defamation</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"家花勿及野花香可惜野花勿久長 <br> ká hwó veh gyih yá hwó hyáng k'au sih yá hwó veh kyeu dsáng <br>"	"<br> 1. (Flowers at home are not as fragrant as flowers in the wild but they don't last long)<div>2. Romantic affairs are short lived</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"家花勿及野花香可惜野花勿久長 <br> ká hwó veh gyih yá hwó hyáng k'ú sih yá hwó veh kyeu dsáng <br>"	"<br> 1. (Flowers at home are not as fragrant as flowers in the wild but they don't last long)<div>2. Romantic affairs are short lived</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"雪中送炭真君子錦上添花是小人 <br> sih tsúng súng t'an tsung kyün tsz kyung zong t'in hwó zz siau nyung <br>"	<br> (Person) a gentleman helps those in real crisis but a scoundrel cozes up to those people in power <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"做天難做四月天做人難做中年人 <br> tsú t'in nan tsú sz yöh t'in tsú nyung nan tsú tsúng nyin nyung <br>"	<br> 1. (The hardest decision for God is what weather the fourth month should be)<div>2. The most difficult time period for a person is middle age</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"銜牢奶頭嫡嫡親有之娘子黑良心 <br> hen lau ná deu tih tih ts'ing yeu tsz nyáng tsz h'uh liáng sing <br>"	<br> (Scolding) to forget the mother after marriage <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"新箍馬桶三日香第四日就臭朋朋 <br> sing kú mó dúng san nyih hyáng di sz nyih zieu ts'eu báng báng <br>"	<br> 1. (New toilet is only fragrant for three days)<div>2. Things are only good in the beginning</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"暴躁個人跳咾呌智慧個人坐拉笑 <br> bau ts'au kuh nyung t'iau lau kyau tsz we kuh nyung zú lá siau <br>"	<br> Angry and impatient person yells but the wise man sits and smiles <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"上海小癟三赤膊帶領戴赤踋著皮鞋 <br> záng h'e siau pih san ts'áh poh tá ling tá ts'áh kyáh tsáh bi há <br>"	<br> Even the poorest Shanghainese person will dress Western style (naked but still wear tie and shoes) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"天上落雨地下流小兩口打相打勿記仇 <br> t'in long loh yü di hau lieu siau liáng k'eu táng siáng táng veh kyi dseu <br>"	<br> Couples fight often like the rain (relationship) <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"行得正立得值那怕和尚尼姑佮板凳 <br> hong tuh tsung lih tuh dsuh ná p'ó hú zong nyi kú keh pan tung <br>"	<br> 1. (Like monk and nun together)<div>2. One should not be afraid of gossip if one is moral and ethical</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"桃花三月開菊花九月開各等時辰來 <br> dau hwó san yöh k'e kyóh hwó kyeu yöh k'e koh tung zz zung le <br>"	<br> 1. (Different flowers blossom in different seasons)<div>2. At the right time, things will happen naturally</div> <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"一手好字二兩老酒三句歪詩四季衣裳 <br> ih seu h'au zz nyi liáng lau tsieu san kyü hwá sz sz kyi i zong <br>"	<br> Calligraphy, alcohol, poetry, clothing (fashion) ~ these are the priorities of a Shanghainese gentleman <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"惡有惡報善有善報若要勿報時晨沒到 <br> oh yeu oh pau zen yeu zen pau záh y'au veh pau zz zung meh tau <br>"	<br> Evil begets evil, good begets good, if it does not happen then the time has not yet come <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
"豆腐心腸越煎越硬鐵打心腸見火就烊 <br> deu vú sing dsáng yöh tsin yöh ngáng t'ih táng sing dsáng kyin h'ú zieu yáng <br>"	"<br> A kind person can become a callous person and vice versa, this is due to one's suffering and experiences <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
"夏至日勿要出門蒔秧冬至日勿要迴去望孃 <br> hau tsz nyih veh y'au ts'eh mung zz y'áng túng tsz nyih veh y'au we ky'i mong nyáng <br>"	"<br> During the summer solstice it is too hot to farm and during the winter solstice time is too short to visit one's mother <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>  "
順時針 <br> zung zz tsung <br>	<br> Clockwise direction <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
逆時針 <br> nyuh zz tsung <br>	<br> Anticlockwise direction <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
拾情 <br> zih dsing <br>	<br> The cringeworthiness of over the top, sickeningly sentimental, and overly dramatic (as in speech and mannerisms) ~ eg. literature students who talk about the meaning of life and death everyday. <br> <br> <hr> <br>  <br>
